items.text: overcompensation with the length. Drops it short and Mendis rocks back and pulls with might through deep square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mendis, FOUR runs

items.preText: Pulasthi: "Gunathilaka should have used his feet. Someone like sanga would have not let the spinner settle down. Experience matters!"
items.text: advances down the ground and meets the pitch before carving it straight over long-on. Minimal power, maximum timing. And maximum result!
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mendis, SIX runs

items.text: this one's not as well-timed. Slightly chipped in the air but he's played it well enough. Comes down the track and launches a length ball over long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mendis, SIX runs

items.text: full outside off, punched down to long-on. Finally some respite from the madness
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: slider on leg stump, pushed away into midwicket. Very, very expensive over from Miraz. Surely must be the end of his first spell?
items.postText: Syed Abbas Hass: "We always miss dil scoop, mahela's patience and sanga's class in this Sir Lankan team...hatts off to those hero's "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and drops it to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, defended off the front foot towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: Kamsy: "What just happend! Mandis making a point to the IPL hammer?" That's one way of looking at it. Pretty uncharacteristic from him.
items.text: sprayed down the leg side, all Tharanga needed to do was put bat as he helps it along to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.preText: Sarun: "Srilanka should open with Chandimal. He has the technique and the fitness to play through the innings just like Dilshan. "
items.text: short, wide, cut hard and point intercepts it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: Irfan: "Good too see Sri Lanka didn't lost moral and fighting back. Hope Bangladesh will come back in wicket hunting."
items.text: short, bounces more this time, Tharanga arches back and slaps to cover-point who moves to his left in a hurry and stops it with a dive
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: oh, dear! Kusal Mendis has thrown it away. He looked in a hurry throughout and he's just played a shot he'll be cross with himself for. Tries to force a pull to the wrong line and length and chips it in the air right off the bottom of the bat to give mid-on some catching practice. Mashrafe is pretty pumped up after that scalp. Doesn't hold back from expressing himself
items.postText: Raveendra: "It has to be dilshan's squad cut, mahela'is late cut, and sanga's cover drive "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, OUT

dismissal.text: BKG Mendis c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 28 (9b 2x4 3x6) SR: 311.11

items.text: presses forward to a fuller ball and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: pushed back to the right of the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short and wide, gently cut to point
items.postText: Tharaka: "@ sarun.... Chandimal has strength but for the ODI it must be fast instead of wasting balls."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: driven with an open face to backward point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: uppish through the cover. Advances down the ground and chips a drive but he's placed it perfectly through the gap at covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: full on the stumps, pushed down to long-off
items.postText: Abir Utsha: "was just praising Kushal and he's gone. I am probably the designated 'jinxer' today. Folks, get your requests in" Oops, what have you done, mate! Brace yourself for some heat.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: sydee: "Kusal Mendis wanted to unsettle BD bowling but he ended poorly unsettling his side.Poor batting."
items.text: short of a length, pitching outside leg, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: keeps very low from a back of a length, defended down the pitch in front of middle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, no run

items.preText: Chamara Perera: "SL Players wasting their good starts. They have to be more responsible "
items.text: full on leg, chipped off the pads over the midwicket and square leg region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, FOUR runs

items.text: oh, my! That's the most bizarre piece of shot selection you'll probably ever see.It's back of a length, and what does he do? Walks across and gets down on one knee to scoop. Needless to say, all he manages is t get hit on some part of the body
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, no run

items.text: turned away to backward square leg and they push back for a rapid second, much to Mashrafe's annoyance
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 2 runs

items.preText: Dickwella's now down in some pain. He wore that blow painfully on the left chest. That was a stinging blow. Zeeshan Mahmud: "Guess who just crept into record book?"
items.text: fullish length outside off, driven with an open face to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: full, sliding on leg, swept to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short and spinning away, reaches out and pats it away through third man. Timed
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, FOUR runs
